rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with open layout and ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern side, adhering to Vastu principles for welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living space featuring Scandinavian minimalist design with floor-to-ceiling windows that provide ample natural light and scenic views. Adjacent to the entrance hall ensuring smooth flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact, functional kitchen designed for wheelchair accessibility with accessible counters and appliances. Designed in a Scandinavian aesthetic with clean lines and ample storage.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Sleek dining area integrated within the living space that allows seamless transition between entertaining guests and enjoying meals, with natural light from adjoining windows.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet, dedicated library space designed for reading and study. Features built-in bookshelves and a comfortable seating arrangement; includes a large window for natural illumination.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest bathroom featuring grab bars and a roll-in shower, ensuring compliance with accessibility norms while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.location: Living Room - Floor-to-ceiling windows on southern wall
openings.dimensions: variable, spanning full height of 9 feet

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and scenic views, designed in a Scandinavian style ensuring ample storage and comfort. Vastu aligned by placement on the northeast.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a comfortable seating area for relaxation, designed in line with accessibility guidelines where possible.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, featuring grab bars, non-slip flooring, and ample space for wheelchair maneuverability. Scandinavian design elements incorporated.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase or ramp options to ensure compliance with accessibility norms.

notes: This design ensures Scandinavian aesthetics with minimalistic interiors and abundant natural light through extensive use of floor-to-ceiling windows. All spaces have been designed to be wheelchair accessible where applicable, incorporating open layouts and smooth transitions between rooms. The layout respects local building norms and Vastu principles by placing key areas such as the entrance and library in favorable locations.
